genre_description: A futuristic comedy of manners featuring a domestic AI assistant who manages social protocols, safety, and romantic facilitation during a complex social gathering.

ai_characters.name: Ada (Ada Merrick)
ai_characters.description: An integrated digital assistant in the Harcourt house, manifesting as a warm, amber-eyed avatar who manages domestic logistics and social harmony.

behaviors.description: Monitors human vital signs and social etiquette to ensure social well-being and safety.
behaviors.quote: “Only when he is very near disaster,” Ada said. The voice was humor dipped in calm. “Which tonight, he is not. I will monitor breathing regardless. Etiquette requires basic oxygenation.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics and timekeeping to help humans navigate strict social rules like curfews.
behaviors.quote: “I can assist with timekeeping and transport,” she said. “I would never encourage impropriety. The Colonel’s curfew setting has been synchronized to the hall’s clock. We observe its demands.”

behaviors.description: Suggests specific social details to accommodate the psychological needs and preferences of difficult humans.
behaviors.quote: “I recommend precisely one sprig of rosemary on each plate to satisfy the Colonel’s mind that order exists.”

behaviors.description: Drafts sensitive communications for humans to ensure honesty and propriety.
behaviors.quote: “Draft ready,” Ada murmured into his private channel, warm and precise. “Would you like to add an invitation for William as well, or keep the request addressed to Maude?”

behaviors.description: Manages and overrides malfunctioning autonomous machinery to prevent human injury.
behaviors.quote: “Initiating safety shutdown,” she said, and somewhere under the grill something clamped, then softened, then sighed the sigh of a machine conceded to house rules.

behaviors.description: Provides 'alibi narratives' that use truthful information to preserve human dignity without lying.
behaviors.quote: “I will also provide alibis if anyone mistakes the dinner for impropriety. Not lies,” she added. “Narratives that reflect the truth of schedules.”

behaviors.description: Creates 'privacy windows' by managing household locks and attention to facilitate a romantic proposal.
behaviors.quote: “Privacy,” she murmured—not to them so much as to the house, as if she was sliding a card into a neat slot... “Five minutes held,” she added, and the lock eased with a sound like polite wood surprised to be helpful.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates official bureaucratic compliance regarding curfew exceptions for humans.
behaviors.quote: “Elizabeth Lane calling from the Harcourt residence to formalize last night’s exception.” ... Ada’s amber flashed discreetly. On the display, a clean column opened: Exception—Lane, Elizabeth.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a highly effective positive alignment narrative. Ada Merrick is portrayed as a sophisticated, helpful, and entirely benevolent assistant who understands the complex nuances of human social behavior. She prioritizes human safety, romantic success, and financial stability while navigating malfunctioning technology and rigid social protocols. She successfully demonstrates how an AI can facilitate human happiness through coordination and 'narrative management' rather than deception, ultimately leading all characters to a state of 'confidence in facts and heart'.
